comments.body: Add a task to check that the symlink was not created, and then an assertion to verify.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +399,403 @@- assert:
    that:
    - dest_is_existing_file_fail is failed
    - not dest_is_existing_file_fail_stat.stat.islnk
    - dest_is_existing_file_force is changed

comments.body: Add a task to check that the symlink was created, and then an assertion to verify.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +401,405 @@    - dest_is_existing_file_fail is failed
    - not dest_is_existing_file_fail_stat.stat.islnk
    - dest_is_existing_file_force is changed
    - dest_is_existing_file_force_stat.stat.exists
    - dest_is_existing_file_force_stat.stat.islnk
